text: Inguinal hernia 5% Megalocornea 5% Sclerocornea 5% Umbilical hernia 5% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Congenital hip dislocation - Dentinogenesis imperfecta - Disproportionate tall stature - Epicanthus - Hearing impairment - Joint laxity - Keratoconus - Keratoglobus - Macrocephaly - Mitral valve prolapse - Molluscoid pseudotumors - Palmoplantar cutis laxa - Red hair - Spondylolisthesis - Visual loss - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom
